case.name: More Than a Butterfly
case.description: Flutters transforms into her human form after her first loss

case.name: Fast Learning
case.description: Yuelia says that her necklace helps people who wear it learn new things faster

case.name: A butterfly?
case.description: One of your opponents is a butterfly. Yes, I'm serious.

markers.marker: Yuelia asks if Aella has skills in multiple Lifes
Yuelia offers to help Aella prepare for her next quest.
Yuelia asks what kind of adventures Aella goes on.
When talking to Akko, Yuelia mentions Hazel, a magician from Fantansy Life
Yuelia asks about Akko's proficiency with magic
Yuelia asks Ahrah who made him
Yuelia asks what exactly Fidget is
Yuelia asks Dust if he lives in the forest
Yuelia thinks Dust is a Forest Spirit
Yuelia doesn't know what a Warmblood is.
Yuelia asks what Aurora Village is like.
Elmie is a guardian spirit of the forest
Yuelia says that Estelle's hair looks cute when it's messy
Yuelia doesn't understand why Estelle needs to be careful when taking off her pantyhose
Yuelia asks if Estelle needs help taking off her overdress
Yuelia tells Estelle that her hair got messed up when taking off her overdress
Yuelia mentions that her mother is deceased to Estelle
When Estelle says she needs to be careful that she doesn't show her underwear, Yuelia tells her that they can already see it
Yuelia asks why Estelle needs to be careful when taking off her pantyhose
Yuelia's Talisman increases the rate at which you level-up by doing work related tasks.
Furlin are intelligent, furry beings
Yuelia casually asks a character who's about to masturbate how long they normally last.
Yuelia tells L'Arachel that she can in fact use magic
Yuelia asks if the item a character is taking off is special in some way.
Yuelia expresses to Joey that the performer Life is a rare choice
Yuelia shows excitement at being able to meet a performer like Joey
Yuelia tells L'Arachel that she can get her friend to make L'Arachel a brand new, awesome wand
Yuelia tells L'Arachel that her friend can make a new staff for her
Yuelia has never seen a staff run out of magic before
Yuelia tells L'Arachel that she should relax
Yuelia didn't know that staffs could break
Yuelia comments that L'Arachel talks in a funny way
Laura is a princess who dresses up as a boy and often sneaks out of her castle.
Yuelia tells Megumin about Flannel, who loves making bombs
Yuelia responds to Megumin's frog question
Yuelia asks about Megumin's outfit
Yuelia asks why Megumin seems nervous
Yuelia offers Megumin to get her friend to make some stamina potions for her =O
Yuelia asks why Megumin is nervous again
Yuelia asks what Megumin is worried about
Yuelia complements Megumin as a talented magician, but also calls her a child.
Yuelia is confused by the name of Nami's weapon
Yuelia comments that Nami shouldn't need any weapons right now
Yuelia mentions Olivia, the pirate governor of Port Puerto, to Nami
Yuelia asks about Nami's sister
Yuelia comments on Nami's bikini
Yuelia comments that Nami's equipment has weird names
Noelia is Yuelia's twin sister and polar opposite.
Yuelia offers to get a luck charm for a character who has lost twice in a row
Yuelia is uncomfortable with Palutena being condescending
Yuelia asks Palutena if she's here to have fun
Yuelia says that as a goddess, Palutena should be kinder
Yuelia wishes a good game to Palutena
Palutena causes Yuelia to get sassy for a moment
Yuelia asks Pit if maybe he's a general of an army.
When talking to Pit, Yuelia mentions the password needed to recieve the Angel Costume
Yuelia comments on Rainbow Dash's unusual skin tone
Yuelia comments on Rainbow Dash's unusual hair color
Yuelia wonders if Rainbow Dash was actually a forest spirit all along
Yuelia is surprised by Rainbow Dash's sudden appearance of wings
Yuelia mentions Madam Purl, the Tailor Life's mentor, to Rarity
Yuelia asks Rarity if she's in the Tailor Life
After transforming, Flutters reveals her real name is Yuelia
Yuelia misunderstands Sayaka's declaration of being a magical girl as her being a magician
Yuelia asks why Sayaka keeps talking about a witch
Yuelia responds to Estelle's deity question by saying that her sister has gone on a date
Yuelia doesn't know what a boobjob is
Spooky's boobjob explanation doesn't help Yuelia very much
Yuelia asks if Spooky even has any clothes to take off.
Yuelia calls Spooky a "good girl"
Yuelia wishes for a fun game with Spooky
Yuelia explains that ghosts usually attack her.
Yuelia calls Spooky pretty
Trivia - Fantasy Life contains a blue ghost enemy called a Spooky. What a coincidence.
Yuelia asks why Spooky would need a knife.
Yuelia doesn't understand why Spooky thinks people would laugh when she reveals her breasts
Yuelia responds to Estelle's deity question by saying that while she's a butterfly, she can get by on sugared water
Yuelia bring up the fact that her best friend has achieved God-level tailor status.
Yuelia answers Tomoko's question about what it's like to be a butterfly
Yuelia answers Tomoko's question to why she's sho positive
Yuelia asks about Tomoko's messy hair
Yuelia asks Tomoko if she needs a hug
Yuelia tells tomoko about why she has magical powers
Yuelia tells Tomoko that she could mind control people, but that she doesn't
Yuelia comments that Tomoko seems nervous
Yuelia tells Tomoko about her parents. Which are literal gods.
Yuelia answers Tomoko's question about using magic to make someone sexier
Yuelia is concerned that Tomoko doesn't get enough sleep
Yuelia tells Tomoko that she's worried about her
Yuelia asks Tomoko if she's okay
Flutters transforms from her butterfly form to her human form
Yuelia doesn't know what shaving is.
Yuelia calls a female opponent beautiful.
Yuelia calls a male opponent handsome
Yuelia is surprised and excited to know that Zizou is a goddess as well.
Yuelia asks if Zizou is also there to have some fun
Yuelia asks Zizou what kind of powers she has
Yuelia tells Zizou that she reminds her of her sister.
